participant_1.background:
I am not close with my parents.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I enjoy the flexibility of my work schedule so I can spend time with my family and dog.
i work 2 jobs.

participant_2.background:
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i read a lot.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just working on some archery designs. What about you?
Same here, I'm actually working on a new dress for my daughter. She has a soccer game today and I wanted to make something special for her.
That's so sweet of you! I'm sure she'll love it.
Thanks! I hope so. I love spending time making clothes for her.
I used to sew a lot when I was younger, but I haven't had much time lately.
That's too bad. It's really relaxing and you can make some really cool stuff.
Yeah, I know. I miss it. Maybe I'll start again soon.
That would be great! I can always use some help with designing clothes.
Thanks, I'll keep that in mind.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love watching Face Off on SyFy. It's so cool to see how the artists transform everyday objects into amazing works of art.
I love that show too! It's so inspiring. I've always wanted to try my hand at it, but I'm not sure I have the talent.
You should give it a try! You might surprise yourself.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! Have a great day!
